meanings.definition: A person or thing that assembles.
meanings.sent1: The toy company hired skilled assemblers to put together the new robot toys.
meanings.sent2: The furniture assemblers quickly built the bookshelves for the library.
meanings.sent3: The team of assemblers raced against the clock to finish the puzzle before dinner.
meanings.sent4: The assemblers of the jigsaw puzzle were like artists creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The assemblers worked diligently, each piece fitting perfectly into place.

meanings.definition: A computer program that translates assembly language into machine code.
meanings.sent1: The software company developed a new assemblers program to improve coding efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The assemblers converted the complex code into a language the computer could understand.
meanings.sent3: The assemblers program had a sense of humor, occasionally adding jokes to the code.
meanings.sent4: Using the assemblers felt like having a magical translator turning words into actions.
meanings.sent5: The assemblers software was a lifesaver for programmers, simplifying their tasks.
